name: Vaultum (LD37)
description:
Fight against robots with bouncing bullets!

**//Instructions//**

Use the Arrow Keys to move, Space to shoot, R to restart, and Esc for exiting stuff. Stop shooting to reload.

**//Credits//**

Skullpixel - Art, code, ideas.

Clockwise 2000 - Sound, music, additional art, ideas.

Some other people - Procrastination/motivational support.

Made in <72 hours for LD 37.
